channel.title: Cryptocurrencies on ShootBird
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptocurrencies on ShootBird

item.title: Workblogging: Blockchain Basics
item.description: For some reason, I’ve found myself elbow-deep in Ethereum’s geth Github repository and am googling the finer points of token issuance and "where does Bitcoin come from". In an effort to stay sane and make sure that if things fall out of my head, some of those things can be at least found here where future-me can point to and say "hey, you looked this up", I’m writing what I’ve found so far here.
